Class ColorLineSensorDDRobot

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.SimpleDDRobot
      • robot.LineSensorDDRobot
        • robot.ColorLineSensorDDRobot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    it.unibo.iot.sensors.colorSensor.IColorSensorObservable, it.unibo.iot.sensors.detector.IDetectorObservable, IDDRobot

    public class ColorLineSensorDDRobot
extends LineSensorDDRobot
implements it.unibo.iot.sensors.colorSensor.IColorSensorObservable
    Simulated Differential Drive robot with two line sensors and a color sensor.
    Author:
    Alessio Tonioni

    • Constructor Detail

      • ColorLineSensorDDRobot

        public ColorLineSensorDDRobot(IPoint robotPosition,
                      double heading,
                      double radius,
                      double wheelDistance,
                      double maxSpeed,
                      IMap workingZone,
                      IPoint leftSensor,
                      IPoint rightSensor,
                      IPoint colorSensor)
        default constructor
        Parameters:
        robotPosition: - starting center of the wheel axis position
        heading: - robot headings in radiants
        radius: - wheel radius in cm
        wheelDistance: - wheel axis length in cm
        maxSpeed: - max angular speed of the wheel
        workingZone: - map in which the robot moves
        leftSensor: - left line sensor position
        rightSensor: - right line sensor position
        colorSensor: - color sensor position
